title: The Rajahamsa Haar: Rose-Cut Diamond and Ruby Pendant Necklace
features: This exquisite necklace features a geometric diamond setting style that leads to a striking carved ruby pendant. The rose-cut diamonds, each meticulously set, provide a brilliant contrast to the deep red hue of the carved ruby. The ruby itself is carved with traditional floral patterns, adding a touch of heritage. The gold has a fine Hyderabadi polish, ensuring lasting luster.
occasions: and special occasions where a statement piece is desired. Suitable for both traditional Telugu events like muhurtham or modern formal events.
description: This Rajahamsa Haar is a harmonious blend of traditional artistry and contemporary design. The carved ruby pendant showcases exceptional craftsmanship, while the diamond setting offers a modern, elegant flair. This necklace is a true heirloom piece, reflecting the rich jewelry heritage of Hyderabad.
